law.catch_line: A person who violates this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, is subject to a f...

text.section: A person who violates this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, is subject to a fine not exceeding $10,000.

Each officer and each director of a corporation that violates this subtitle, each partner of a partnership that violates this subtitle, and the owner of a sole proprietorship that violates this subtitle is also subject to the penalty under this section.
